report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Make/Model]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Location of Damage:**
- Rear Bumper: The rear bumper has visible dents and scratches. The damage appears to be concentrated on the lower portion of the bumper, near the wheel well.

**Type of Damage:**
- The damage seems to be the result of a collision or impact. The dents and scratches suggest that the bumper has been pushed inwards, likely from a side impact or a low-speed collision.

**Additional Notes:**
- The area around the damage shows signs of repair tape or filler, indicating previous attempts at repair.
- The paint appears to be intact but may need touch-up to match the surrounding area.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has sustained damage to the rear bumper. The extent of the damage requires further assessment by a professional mechanic or body shop to determine the appropriate course of action for repairs.

**Prepared By:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Attachments:**
- Photographs of the damage (attached).

**End of Report.**
